TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit QueryStringConverter extends System.Object

summary.span: 此类可将查询字符串形式的参数转换为适当类型的对象，

span.span: This class converts a parameter in a query string to an object of the appropriate type.

summary.span: 它还可以将参数从对象转换为其查询字符串表示形式。

span.span: It can also convert a parameter from an object to its query string representation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可在 URL 中指定查询字符串形式的参数。Parameters can be specified in a query string within a URL. 此类采用这些字符串形式的指定参数，并将它们转换为对象。This class takes those parameters specified in a string and converts them into objects. 例如，可定义以下协定：For example, the following contract is defined. ```csharp [ServiceContract] interface Calculator { [WebGet(UriTemplate="Add?n1={n1}&n2={n2}")] [OperationContract] long Add(long n1, long n2); } ``` Windows Communication Foundation （WCF）服务实现此接口，并将其公开到上的的终结点 `http://localhost:8000/MyCalcService` 。A Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service implements this interface and exposes it on an endpoint with the at `http://localhost:8000/MyCalcService`. `Add`可以通过向发送 HTTP GET 来调用服务操作 `http://localhost:8000/MyCalcService/Add?n1=10&n2=5` 。The `Add` service operation can be called by sending an HTTP GET to `http://localhost:8000/MyCalcService/Add?n1=10&n2=5`. 接收此 URL 并将在该 URL 中指定的两个参数（n1 和 n2）转换为两个具有适当值的 `long` 对象。The receives this URL and converts the two parameters (n1 and n2) specified in the URL into two `long` objects with the appropriate values. 可从 派生一个类，以控制如何将查询字符串参数映射到服务操作的参数。You can derive a class from to control how query string parameters are mapped into a service operation's parameters. 默认情况下， 支持以下类型：The supports the following types by default: - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 数组 array - - - - 枚举Enums - 具有可在类型和字符串表示形式之间来回进行转换的 `TypeConverterAttribute` 的类型。Types that have a `TypeConverterAttribute` that can convert the type to and from a string representation. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用 类在字符串和 32 位整数之间转换。The following code shows how to use the class to convert between a string and a 32-bit integer. [!code-csharp[QueryStringConverter#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/querystringconverter/cs/program.cs#0)] [!code-vb[QueryStringConverter#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/querystringconverter/vb/program.vb#0)]

summary.span: 将查询字符串参数转换为指定类型。

span.span: Converts a query string parameter to the specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `parameterType` 为值类型且该参数为 `null`，则返回 `parameterType` 的默认值。If the `parameterType` is a value type and the parameter is `null`, then the default value of the `parameterType` is returned. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何将字符串转换为指定类型。The following code shows how to convert a string to the specified type. [!code-csharp[QueryStringConverter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/querystringconverter/cs/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[QueryStringConverter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/querystringconverter/vb/program.vb#2)]

exception.span: 提供的字符串的格式不正确。

span.span: The provided string does not have the correct format.
